Name: Grab taxi integration
Description: Send ride receipts automatically from Grab to Rydoo

Name: In-app tips and tricks
Description: Guided in-app onboarding to support end users during their first steps in RydooHighlight new features

Name: Mobile - Linked accounts
Description: Currently  it is only possible to scan receipts for your linked accounts with our mobile application. This idea is to make it possible to scan a receipt, fill in the details and save or submit the expense for a linked account on our mobile app.
